dependencies.description: A comma separated list of npm modules in the format name@version for each. i.e. '@angular/material@^5.2.0,@angular/cdk@^5.2.0'

devDependencies.description: A comma separated list of npm modules in the format name@version for each. i.e. '@angular/material@^5.2.0,@angular/cdk@^5.2.0'

json.description: Stringified object with dependencies and devDependencies, just like in package.json format

workingDirectory.description: The folder where npm install should be performed
